result.execSummary:
DARIUS D WRIGHT was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means DARIUS D WRIGHT was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. DARIUS D WRIGHT

defendant.name: WRIGHT, DARIUS D
defendant.address: NEW LISBON CORRECTIONAL INST 2000 PROGRESS DR, NEW LISBON, WI 53950

records.addlTxt: 11:04 AM Defendant DARIUS D WRIGHT in court in custody.  Attorney Joshua M Andreasen in court for State of Wisconsin. All parties appear by zoom.   COURT:  Reviews rights with defendant.   DEF:  Waive extradition.  STATE:  Waiver sent to New Lisbon Correctional for signature.  COURT:  Juneau County deputy will witness signature and will bring the paperwork back to the court.
Arrangements have been made for Mr. Wright to appear by telephone from NLC for his June 24, 2022 hearing.
Extradition hearing on June 24, 2022 at 11:00 am.
